string.text: Type 1 Scanner
Specialized scanner used by scientists to study the processes occurring inside anomalies.

Schematic diagram: 1A38.1294
Schematics providing the data required for using the formulas to calculate frequency and phase responses to construct the scanner systems required.
Plans for product sample: 22.17
The drawings needed to build the instrument for tuning the Advanced scanner structural systems.
'Note Homs'

'Entries hardly legible:' ... their team of five people nominated ..... the ship ... at the south-west ... today ... will be minus one, and then have a go ... goal of all .... will update ... as agreed ... the mole. ''
Flower of the Devil

Artifact thermal proiskhozhzheniya. It has a very peculiar structure. The shape of a flower. Radioactive. Many believe this artifact once a beautiful legend, but wrong. Because of the instability is often broken down and transformed into a fireball. Contradictory information about the properties.
PDA Goodwin
One of the poslednimih records were deposited on the map mark the route patrols, as well as a few words about the behavior seen encamped on the route critters. The remaining information is encrypted.
Note Goodwin

Illegible entry made in haste: '... the hell kind of tunnel really bad .. what kind of men in black ... and the beasts ... ak gone mad ... are kept side, do not try to attack, but as if guarded by ... need to quickly move to the base. '
Case researchers
It gathers the data results of the study of psi-static anomalies.
Scheme gear
The principal documents and charts containing data reduction for the assembly of devices.
Drawings phased devices
Collected diagrams and drawings needed to build basic circuits phased devices.
The modular scheme
Schemes contain a highly mattered information to create and build modular units.
Documents Chekhov

Folder with documents svobodovskogo former leader, a stalker by the name of Chekhov. Some of the entries: 'Further progress in the center of the interior areas are vital. Main forces should proceed to the Military, they headed Lukas. Should be fixed at a point near the old military base. Loki with Egghead to send expeditionary forces to Limansk and further north in the vicinity of the station Yanov . Debt something was up, but kamenschikov can not be dismissed ... '
Information on Scar

Documents Lukas, a former deputy svobodovskogo, and later leader of the clan in the Military, they are information about the appearance in the Dark Valley stalker named Scar, and the subsequent events after that conflict, the Fremen, and blue.
X-Ray/: X18/ Top Secret
There is a special dotuments about one of the secret lab X18. Some more inormation about any experiments of schientists groups "O-Soznanie"
Scanner frequencies
Special low-frequency scanner to detect, fixation and reading APC signal.
Special Tools
Set of special tools designed for the removal of electronic equipment.
Transformer Module
Module with stuffing and electronic circuits. It contains some important technical indicators and shot settings from the old factory equipment. Type 48-14.
Generator module
Module with stuffing and electronic circuits. It contains some important technical indicators and shot settings from the old factory equipment. Type 72-12.
Electronic module
Module with stuffing and electronic circuits. It contains some important technical indicators and shot settings from the old factory equipment. Type 21-27.
Folder Sultan
A folder with the documents part of the bandit leader Sultan. Contain information on the supply to various areas in the contraband.
Overhead Sultan
Documents with different accounts for consignment imported illegally into the Zone products.
Supply routes
Supply chain, transportation and false documents smugglers operating in the zone.
